plot: Hinata and Aoi made a promise to each other when they were very young to climb a mountain. Years later they get in contact again and start acting on that promise. However Aoi has developed a fear of heights, and Hinata has little patience for planning and even less caution.
opening_theme: "Staccato Days" (スタッカート・デイズ) by Yuka Iguchi and Kana Asumi
